remarks: The subtraction rule for everywhere-differentiable functions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
dvsubf.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. { RR , CC } ) $.
dvsubf.f $e |- ( ph -> F : X --> CC ) $.
dvsubf.g $e |- ( ph -> G : X --> CC ) $.
dvsubf.fdv $e |- ( ph -> dom ( S _D F ) = X ) $.
dvsubf.gdv $e |- ( ph -> dom ( S _D G ) = X ) $.
dvsubf $p |- ( ph -> ( S _D ( F oF - G ) ) = ( ( S _D F ) oF - ( S _D G ) ) ) $.
